# .github/skills/README.md

This directory contains Agent Skills for GitHub Copilot and other AI agents. Skills provide project-specific context, best practices, and workflows to improve the quality and relevance of AI-generated suggestions.

- `project-architecture.md`: Describes the overall structure, conventions, and workflows for the Training-Analysis project.

To add more skills, create additional `.md` files in this directory with clear, actionable information for AI agents.
